alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Iron; Kane; Piute; Sevier (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 30 at 9:56PM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Utah... Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Garfield, Piute, Sevier, Kane and Iron Counties. .Warm temperatures will continue to melt snowpack, causing elevated flows. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...Minor flooding is forecast to continue. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Near minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sevier River Near Hatch. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 3.9 feet (1046 cfs), minor flooding will affect fields. Assorted bridges and select low lying structures will receive minor flood damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM MDT Tuesday the stage was 3.8 feet (1000 cfs). - Forecast...The river will oscillate around minor flood stage with daily peaks occurring each morning. Based on the latest forecast, the river is forecast to ultimately fall below flood stage by early this weekend. A combination of warmer than currently forecast temperatures or more rainfall in the basin than currently forecast could delay the ultimate drop below flood stage. - Minor flood stage is 3.9 feet (1046 cfs). &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Avoid walking near the riverbanks as the flow of the water is high cold and fast. Keep children and pets away from the riverbank. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon at 1200 PM MDT.
